danger.title: Oh No!
danger.text: It looks like your password has been found in the database of HaveIBeenPwned!

timeout.title: Whoops!
timeout.text:
I'm sorry, but the request took too long to process.
Please check your internet connection and antivirus software or contact my developer:

support@astrogd.eu

window.title: Check your password against HIBPs database

switchLanguage.title: Switch language
switchLanguage.success: Your language preference has been saved

update.title: An update is available
update.text:
An update to version {version} is available.
By clicking on "Download" you will be redirected to download the new version.

changelog.title: Update finished
changelog.text: Thank you for updating to version {version}! If you want, you can view all changes now.
